originalText.text: Great customer service by Juan. I walked in last minute for inspection due one day from scheduled. The staff was done for the day  yet Mr. Juan did the inspection for me. I assume he is the manager / owner since he was behind  the counter. When i asked he said ‚Äúis fine he will do it not to worried ‚Äú Thankfully he did. I write this review because I visit two other places prior ;one said they done had lots of work and other no tickets to complete such. I appreciate the time and welcoming by Mr. Juan ‚Ä¶ five stars is too little when it come to his attention and approach to customers. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èthank you

originalText.text: I've been bringing my 2004 Honda to Miguel at Global Gas Station for a few years and he is great. His prices are the best, he does a great job and he's fast. Any time I've taken the car elsewhere I've regretted it. Go to Miguel and all the guys at this shop!

text.text: I've been bringing my 2004 Honda to Miguel at Global Gas Station for a few years and he is great. His prices are the best, he does a great job and he's fast. Any time I've taken the car elsewhere I've regretted it. Go to Miguel and all the guys at this shop!

originalText.text:
OUTSTANDING & FRIENDLY SERVICE!
I am visiting from Maryland and discovered that one of my tires had gone flat while parked. Global took me in immediately...identified the problem and corrected it for a reasonable fee. I highly recommend them for anyone in the area!

text.text:
OUTSTANDING & FRIENDLY SERVICE!
I am visiting from Maryland and discovered that one of my tires had gone flat while parked. Global took me in immediately...identified the problem and corrected it for a reasonable fee. I highly recommend them for anyone in the area!

originalText.text: Really happy to have found (recommended by a friend and reviews!) a great auto mechanic down the block to support. These guys are great. Benitez got in the car with me and immediately reproduced and diagnosed the grinding sound as brake and rotors gone bad, replacement needed. No mechanic has ever done this for me! He performed the job same day, showed me the old parts and the installed new ones. Told me my tires were bad which I suspected as they are really loud and rather thumpy, but wasn't pushy when I wanted to research more about brands, types, and cost. They charge good prices and have great communication. üëç

originalText.text: If you ever need someone to get real with you about your car and go the extra mile, go to Miguel. He is the kindest, most knowledgeable mechanic, he tries to keep costs down, and he will keep looking til he finds the problem, even if it isn‚Äôt obvious. It‚Äôs nice to know there‚Äôs someone who actually cares about you and you car. He‚Äôs smart, trustworthy, and handsome to boot! ;)
